narrative: You are wondering down the winding path through <PlaceName> woods
It's been a long day on the road, and day is turning to night, when you see the light of a tavern through the trees
You decide to go in, needed the rest and the mead. As you enter, you read a sign on the door, 'adventurers wanted'
You enter the inn, and are greeted by the sound of merry drinking in the next room over
It's warm in here, and you are greeted by a large man at the front desk
Welcome to the Bearded Lady inn, I'm Gregor Karlsson!
Listen, a man such as you wouldn't be looking to make some extra change would you?
options: 1. Polietly decline, you've had a long day and can't bear to make it longer
2. Ask for more Details, you can't accept without them.

narrative: Ah, good, there's a spider nest down by the river to the east, some huge spiders live there
Go and clear the cave out, and I'll reward you handsomely
Ahh, thank you kind sir
Tell you what, I'll let you stay for free tonight, as a sort of pre-payment if you will
My daughter Bessy said she saw something down in the cellar the other day, something large.
Being the man here, I went down to check it out.
Turned out to be some large spider, about two feet in height.
I tried to kill it, but it ran out and into the woods, just east of here, I think it's got a nest down by the river.
Do you reckon you could go an kill the nest, I don't want them coming back and hurting my family.
options: 1. Sure thing, anything for another citizen of the realm

narrative: Aw well, fair enough
If you're looking to stay the night, I can get you a room, otherwise the bar is just around the corner
Come on those spiders won't kill themselves!
You start walking down the river and on your way there you encounter a stray dog
options: 1. Avoid the dog and continue into the spider's nest
